bibl.title: Lokaal en globaal. Egypte in de Romeinse wereld. [Local et global. L'Égypte dans le monde romain.] Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Argues that it is only possible to properly understand Roman Egypt when it is done on a local and global level simultaneously. Some examples of Egyptian influence on Rome are discussed before turning to Roman Egypt itself (where the necropolis of Hermopolis Magna and the Fayum portraits are dealt with in more detail).
bibl.seg: VERSLUYS Miguel John, Lokaal en globaal. Egypte in de Romeinse wereld. [Local et global. L'Égypte dans le monde romain.] Avec résumé en anglais.

Argues that it is only possible to properly understand Roman Egypt when it is done on a local and global level simultaneously. Some examples of Egyptian influence on Rome are discussed before turning to Roman Egypt itself (where the necropolis of Hermopolis Magna and the Fayum portraits are dealt with in more detail).
